entries.journal_entry_description: Chief Kerritamba is displeased with your actions. To mend the relationship between you and the Kerritamba, the Chief has sent you to retrieve two items to bring back the unconscious Wirartu. Find a Bag of Dust from the Sayormi Witches and a Mysess Blossom for the Chief.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Find a Mysess Blossom and return it to Chief Kerritamba.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Find a Bag of Dust from the Sayormi Witches.
